A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The action scenes were pretty cool so I give it 2 stars for that... The story was full of huge plot holes\, the humor felt too much like marvel movies which ruined a lot of scenes (and at points I wasn't sure if certain scenes were supposed to be funny or serious)\, the lack of back stories for characters was frustrating\, it felt like all the things JJ Abrams set up in TFA was just wasted (& I wasn't crazy about TFA since it was pretty much a remake of episode 4 but this movie made me appreciate that one so much more lol).

The biggest issue I had with this movie is Snoke... They built him up last movie and this movie to this bad ass that's super powerful\, became the supreme leader\, and has use of the force... And explain nothing about him before killing him!!

Actually as I'm writing this I'm getting angrier so I'm lowering this to one and a half Star lol
